video_prompt: A young woman, facing slightly, subtly tilts her head. Her left hand gently rises to adjust a necklace. Loose strands of her high ponytail softly frame her face as her wavy hair shifts. Her expressive eyes convey a casual, relaxed vibe.
image_prompt: **Black-and-white pencil sketch of a young woman, waist up, with large expressive eyes, full lips, and a high ponytail. She wears a cropped, slouchy sweatshirt and layered necklaces, subtly touching one. Emphasize subtle shading, fine lines, and a relaxed, youthful aesthetic on a white background.**
refined_video_prompt: Her head subtly tilts. Her left hand gently rises to adjust a necklace. Wavy strands from her high ponytail softly shift, dynamically framing her face. Her eyes subtly shift their gaze, conveying a casual, relaxed expression.
